Komentar: Pretty Cool!: I thought it was going to be a neat journal, but instead its a neat little notes to go book that come in handy!
Very Good: Pretty good. Like the DC version, very well done. But I really hoped to see more of the earlier artwork by the original artists for the older chartacters.
Artwork???: Did the National Socialists require censorship here or something? The new artwork isn't even scary... WTF You've ruined a classic. No one buy this BS.
Why must we all be forced to read this?: Sure, it's a great story. It made for a smashing movie. It's so badly written that I want to scream. Pick up the Cliff's Notes.
